Form Name: Alien's Change of Address Card
Description: Change of address notification for immigrants

Form Name: Petition for Special Immigrant Classification for Afghan SIV Applicants
Description: For Afghan nationals who worked with U.S. government seeking SIV status

Form Name: Certificate of Eligibility for Exchange Visitor Status
Description: For J-1 exchange visitors

Form Name: Immigrant Visa Application
Description: Department of State visa application

Form Name: Notice of Appeal to the Board of Immigration Appeals
Description: Appeal of Immigration Judge decision
Notes: Filed with Board of Immigration Appeals

Form Name: Notice of Appeal to the Board of Immigration Appeals from a Decision of a DHS Officer
Description: Appeal of USCIS decision to the BIA

Form Name: Application for Cancellation of Removal for Certain Permanent Residents
Description: Relief from removal for permanent residents

Form Name: Application for Cancellation of Removal for Non-Permanent Residents
Description: Relief from removal for non-permanent residents

Form Name: Genealogy Index Search Request
Description: Search for historical immigration records

Form Name: Genealogy Records Request
Description: Request copies of historical immigration records

Form Name: Fee Schedule
Description: Lists current filing fees for USCIS forms

Form Name: E-Notification of Application/Petition Acceptance
Description: Request for email/text notification of application receipt

Form Name: Authorization for Credit Card Transactions
Description: Credit card payment form for filing fees
Notes: Alternative to check or money order payment

Form Name: Notice of Entry of Appearance as Attorney or Accredited Representative
Description: Form notifying USCIS of legal representation

Form Name: Biographic Information Form
Description: Basic biographical information

Form Name: Biographic Information
Description: Biographical information for certain applications

Form Name: Freedom of Information/Privacy Act Request
Description: Request for records under FOIA or Privacy Act
Notes: To obtain copies of immigration records

Form Name: Request for the Return of Original Documents
Description: Request return of original documents submitted to USCIS
Notes: For return of valuable original documents

Form Name: Application for Replacement/Initial Nonimmigrant Arrival-Departure Document
Description: For replacement of lost or damaged I-94 record
Notes: For nonimmigrants needing proof of status

Form Name: Petition for a Nonimmigrant Worker
Description: Filed by employers to bring foreign workers to the U.S. temporarily in various nonimmigrant categories
Notes: Used for H-1B, L-1, O-1 and many other categories

Form Name: Petition for Alien Fiancé(e)
Description: Used by U.S. citizens to bring fiancé(e)s to the United States for marriage
Notes: Must marry within 90 days of fiancé(e)'s arrival

Form Name: Petition for Nonimmigrant Worker: O Classification
Description: For individuals with extraordinary ability in sciences, arts, education, business or athletics

Form Name: Nonimmigrant Petition Based on Blanket L Petition
Description: For qualifying L-1 blanket petition beneficiaries

Form Name: Petition for Alien Relative
Description: U.S. citizens or permanent residents use this form to establish their relationship with eligible relatives who wish to immigrate to the United States
Notes: First step in family-based immigration process

Form Name: Supplemental Information for Spouse Beneficiary
Description: Supplemental form providing additional information about spouse beneficiaries
Notes: Must be submitted with I-130 when petitioning for a spouse

Form Name: Application for Travel Documents, Parole Documents, and Arrival/Departure Records
Description: Used for various travel documents including Advance Parole and Refugee Travel Document
Notes: Multiple travel document types in one form

Form Name: Application for Travel Document (Carrier Documentation)
Description: For lawful permanent residents who lost their Green Card while abroad
Notes: Must be filed while outside the United States

Form Name: Declaration of Financial Support
Description: Financial support affidavit for visitors and certain nonimmigrants

Form Name: Immigrant Petition for Alien Worker
Description: Employers or self-petitioners use this to request immigrant classification based on employment
Notes: For EB-1, EB-2 and EB-3 categories

Form Name: Application for Relief Under Former Section 212(c)
Description: Relief from removal for certain lawful permanent residents

Form Name: Application for Advance Permission to Enter as a Nonimmigrant
Description: Permission to enter as nonimmigrant despite inadmissibility

Form Name: Application for Waiver of Passport and/or Visa
Description: Waiver of passport and visa requirements

Form Name: Certificate of Eligibility for Nonimmigrant Student Status
Description: For F-1 and M-1 student visa applicants

Form Name: Application for Permission to Reapply for Admission After Deportation or Removal
Description: Permission to reapply for admission after being deported or removed
Notes: For those previously deported seeking reentry

Form Name: Notice of Appeal or Motion
Description: Appeal or motion to reconsider/reopen USCIS decisions
Notes: For appealing denials on most forms

Form Name: Petition for Amerasian Widow(er) or Special Immigrant
Description: For special immigrants including religious workers and certain abused spouses

Form Name: Record of Abandonment of Lawful Permanent Resident Status
Description: Voluntary abandonment of permanent resident status
Notes: For those who no longer wish to maintain status

Form Name: Application to Register Permanent Residence or Adjust Status
Description: Used to apply for lawful permanent resident status (Green Card) while in the United States
Notes: Can be filed concurrently with certain petition forms

Form Name: Adjustment of Status Under Section 245(i)
Description: For adjustment applicants under special 245(i) provisions

Form Name: Confirmation of Bona Fide Job Offer or Request for Job Portability
Description: Confirms job offer in I-140 remains valid or requests job portability

Form Name: Waiver of Rights, Privileges, Exemptions and Immunities
Description: Waiver of diplomatic rights for A or G nonimmigrants who want to adjust status
Notes: Required for certain diplomats seeking green cards

Form Name: Immigrant Petition by Standalone Investor
Description: For EB-5 investors not associated with a regional center

Form Name: Immigrant Petition by Regional Center Investor
Description: For EB-5 investors associated with a regional center

Form Name: Application to Extend/Change Nonimmigrant Status
Description: Request to extend stay or change to a different nonimmigrant status
Notes: For tourists, students and other nonimmigrants

Form Name: Interagency Record of Request
Description: For A, G or NATO nonimmigrants requesting change/adjustment of status
Notes: Requires endorsement from Department of State

Form Name: Application for Issuance or Replacement of Northern Mariana Card
Description: For Northern Mariana Islands certificate of identity

Form Name: Application for Asylum and for Withholding of Removal
Description: Application for asylum based on fear of persecution
Notes: Generally must file within one year of arrival

Form Name: Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative
Description: Petition to adopt a child from a non-Hague Convention country

Form Name: Application for Advance Processing of an Orphan Petition
Description: Application to be found suitable to adopt from non-Hague countries
Notes: First step in non-Hague adoption process

Form Name: Application for Waiver of Grounds of Inadmissibility
Description: Waiver of certain grounds that would prevent admission to the U.S.
Notes: Various inadmissibility grounds may be waived

Form Name: Application for Provisional Unlawful Presence Waiver
Description: Waiver for unlawful presence before departing for immigrant visa interview
Notes: Reduces time separated from family members

Form Name: Application by Refugee for Waiver of Inadmissibility Grounds
Description: Waiver of inadmissibility for refugees

Form Name: Application for Waiver of the Foreign Residence Requirement
Description: Waiver of two-year home residence requirement for J-1 visa holders
Notes: Required for certain J visa holders to adjust status

Form Name: Health and Human Services Statistical Data for Refugee/Asylee Adjusting Status
Description: Statistical data collection for refugee/asylee adjustment

Form Name: Supplementary Statement for Application for Naturalization
Description: Additional information for naturalization applications

Form Name: Application for Status as a Temporary Resident
Description: For legalization applicants under Immigration Reform and Control Act

Form Name: Application for Waiver of Grounds of Inadmissibility
Description: Waiver for certain legalization applicants
Notes: Used with I-687 and related applications

Form Name: Report of Medical Examination and Vaccination Record
Description: Medical examination for adjustment of status applicants
Notes: Must be completed by designated civil surgeon

Form Name: Notice of Appeal of Decision Under Section 210 or 245A
Description: Appeal form for legalization decisions

Form Name: Application to Adjust Status From Temporary to Permanent Resident
Description: For legalization applicants to adjust to permanent residence

Form Name: Refugee/Asylee Relative Petition
Description: Petition to bring spouse and children of refugees and asylees to the U.S.
Notes: Must file within two years of refugee/asylee status

Form Name: Petition to Remove Conditions on Residence
Description: To remove conditional status obtained through marriage
Notes: Submit 90 days before conditional residence expires

Form Name: Application for Employment Authorization
Description: Used to apply for work authorization and Employment Authorization Document (EAD)
Notes: Required for many categories to legally work in the U.S.

Form Name: Application for Issuance or Replacement of Northern Mariana Card
Description: For Northern Mariana Islands residents

Form Name: Petition to Classify Convention Adoptee as an Immediate Relative
Description: Petition to adopt a child from a Hague Convention country

Form Name: Application for Determination of Suitability to Adopt a Child from a Convention Country
Description: Application to be found suitable to adopt from Hague countries
Notes: First step in Hague adoption process

Form Name: Application for Family Unity Benefits
Description: Protection from removal for certain family members of legalized immigrants

Form Name: Application for Temporary Protected Status
Description: For nationals of designated countries to apply for temporary protection in the U.S.
Notes: For citizens of countries with ongoing crises

Form Name: Consideration of Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals
Description: Request for DACA status
Notes: For certain individuals who came to U.S. as children

Form Name: Application for Action on an Approved Application or Petition
Description: Request for duplicate approval notice or other actions on approved applications

Form Name: Petition by Entrepreneur to Remove Conditions on Permanent Resident Status
Description: Remove conditions from EB-5 investor green card

Form Name: Inter-Agency Alien Witness and Informant Record
Description: For law enforcement agencies seeking S nonimmigrant classification for informants
Notes: Only filed by law enforcement agencies

Form Name: Renewal of Application for Entrepreneurial Parole
Description: Request renewal of entrepreneur parole

Form Name: Affidavit of Support Under Section 213A of the INA
Description: Financial support form showing immigrant has adequate means of support and won't rely on government assistance

Form Name: Contract Between Sponsor and Household Member
Description: Allows household members to combine income with sponsor to meet income requirements

Form Name: Affidavit of Support Under Section 213A of the INA
Description: Simplified version of Form I-864 for certain sponsors
Notes: For sponsors only using their own income

Form Name: Poverty Guidelines for Affidavit of Support
Description: Poverty guidelines for affidavit of support sponsors
Notes: Reference chart; not an application form

Form Name: Sponsor's Notice of Change of Address
Description: Change of address for I-864 sponsors
Notes: Required within 30 days of sponsor's move

Form Name: Application for Suspension of Deportation or Special Rule Cancellation of Removal (NACARA)
Description: Relief for certain nationals of Guatemala El Salvador and former Soviet bloc countries
Notes: Under Nicaraguan Adjustment and Central American Relief Act

Form Name: Employment Eligibility Verification
Description: Employers use to verify employment eligibility of all employees

Form Name: Application to Replace Permanent Resident Card
Description: Used to replace or renew a Green Card
Notes: For expired or lost Green Cards

Form Name: Application for Authorization to Issue Certification for Health Care Workers
Description: Organizations request authority to issue healthcare worker certificates

Form Name: Request for Premium Processing Service
Description: Request expedited processing of certain petitions

Form Name: Application to Extend or Change Parole for Entrepreneurs
Description: Request to extend entrepreneur parole or change terms

Form Name: Request for Fee Waiver
Description: Request for waiver of filing fees based on inability to pay

Form Name: Application for T Nonimmigrant Status
Description: For victims of human trafficking
Notes: T visa for human trafficking victims

Form Name: Supplement A: for Family Member of T-1 Recipient
Description: For family members of T visa recipients
Notes: For qualifying relatives of trafficking victims

Form Name: Petition for U Nonimmigrant Status
Description: For victims of certain crimes who help law enforcement

Form Name: Supplement A: for Family Member of U-1 Recipient
Description: For family members of U visa recipients
Notes: For qualifying relatives of crime victims

Form Name: Petition for Qualifying Family Member of a U-1 Nonimmigrant
Description: For U visa holders to request immigration benefits for family members who never held U nonimmigrant status
Notes: For family members of crime victims

Form Name: Application for Suspension of Deportation
Description: Relief from deportation for certain individuals

Form Name: Arrival/Departure Record
Description: Record of arrival and authorized stay in U.S.

Form Name: Application for Entrepreneur Parole
Description: For entrepreneurs to request temporary stay to grow business

Form Name: Request for Reduced Fee
Description: Request reduced filing fees based on income
Notes: For incomes between 150%-400% of poverty level

Form Name: Declaration of Self-Sufficiency
Description: Declaration related to public charge determination
Notes: No longer in use after policy changes

Form Name: Public Charge Bond
Description: Bond for applicants deemed inadmissible on public charge grounds
Notes: Only filed by invitation from USCIS

Form Name: Application for Regional Center Designation
Description: Application to designate a Regional Center under the EB-5 program

Form Name: Application for Approval of Investment in a Commercial Enterprise
Description: Regional center project application

Form Name: Regional Center Annual Statement
Description: Annual reporting for approved regional centers
Notes: Required annual filing for regional centers

Form Name: Bona Fides of Person Involved with Regional Center Program
Description: Background information on regional center personnel

Form Name: Registration for Direct and Third-Party Promoters
Description: Registration for EB-5 promoters
Notes: Required for anyone promoting EB-5 investments

Form Name: Request for a Hearing on a Decision in Naturalization Proceedings
Description: Appeal of denial of naturalization application
Notes: Must file within 30 days of denial

Form Name: Application for Naturalization
Description: Application to become a U.S. citizen through naturalization
Notes: Primary form for lawful permanent residents to become citizens

Form Name: Application for Replacement Naturalization/Citizenship Document
Description: Request for replacement of naturalization or citizenship certificates
Notes: For lost damaged or incorrect documents

Form Name: Application for Certificate of Citizenship
Description: To obtain proof of U.S. citizenship acquired through parents
Notes: For those who acquired citizenship but need documentation

Form Name: Application for Citizenship and Issuance of Certificate Under Section 322
Description: For U.S. citizen parents seeking citizenship for their child residing outside the U.S.

Form Name: Medical Certification for Disability Exceptions
Description: Request for exemption from English and civics requirements due to disability
Notes: Must be completed by licensed medical professional
